prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with sleek blue fur and elegant fin-like ears.
Imagine a Pokemon that resembles a mermaid, combining aquatic elements with a friendly demeanor.
Show me a creature that has a flowing tail and is known for its calming presence in water.
Generate an aquatic Pokemon with a playful personality and the ability to create waves.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in ocean habitats and has vibrant blue and white colors.
Make a water-type evolution that has graceful features and a majestic appearance.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies the essence of the sea and has enchanting fins.
